website_summaries.verdict: Another inexpensive door lock for customers wanting excellent home protection.
pros: Holds up to 600 pounds weight capacity for an inexpensive price
Works well with various door materials, such as glass, metal, wood, and fireproof doors
cons: Owners wished it were higher quality

customer_reviews.title: HODOR
customer_reviews.text: Didn't test out the 600lbs max limit, but it HODOR'd well.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!  Couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a hidden door. Not sure if it's exact force is 600lbs, but if not, it's REALLY close! Simple to install. One Hot wire, one Neutral. I combined this with. The install is complete laid out in the Power Supply instructions. Takes maybe 10 minutes, to get everything connected. I also added a simple push button similar to this. Not the exact one, but almost. Couldn't be happier! Should anything change, I will update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: ahoffoss

customer_reviews.title: A not-well-engineered version of the Seco-Larm
customer_reviews.text: Well, you get what you pay for. I have installed many mag locks over the years. My favorite: Seco-larm 1200 lb. 600 lb holding is really not sufficient; if you're going to do this project yourself, do it right. In addition, the KEY to a proper installation is the template! This unit did not come with an installation template. All instructions were in Chinese with much to do about architect specs, but no template. The 1200 lb Seco-larm is a brute and weighs a ton; get it!! Aloha.
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: Little to no instructions but not really needed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions provided are pretty much only in Chinese and I'd not convinced of the 600lb rating but the lock does get the job done. Installation is pretty straight forward so detailed instructions aren't really needed but getting the striking plate lined up square to the magnet is critical to the functionality and does require some time to get just right.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions, very sensitive to air gap
customer_reviews.text: 1. The instructions are only in Chinese. This is never mentioned in their product description. 2. Unless you have the magnet touching the plate, the unit will not work. Any air gap makes the unit worthless. I installed mine on an outside door that has a door closer. I had to increase the closer pressure and move the lock plate out past the weatherstripping to make contact. Now I have drafts. That is the only way it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Get that open
customer_reviews.text: If you beer-stealing idiots can get this open without breaking the door, good luck to you. Pulls like a mule and holds like cement.
customer_reviews.author: Just Call Ben

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold 600lbs unless over 1amp at 12v
customer_reviews.text: Supplied with 12v 500ma, this is within spec according to the product listing. The magnet hold approx 20lbs force and is EASILY separated by hand. 12v with over 1amp provided the rated pull force.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a large commercial building security entrance. This lock is used 30 40 times a day and has never failed, Its been up and working for months without a problem. Good product and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: This mag lock and all the associated parts I purchased were well suited for our use in adding controlled access to a door in our facility. The job was successfully completed and I was very pleased with the whole experience with Amazon, the prices of all the components was far below that of industrial supply outlets and the speed of delivery is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Rocco, Maintenance Dept.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnet!!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, and very easy to use. First product we had issue but the company send us a good one pretty fast! Very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: T.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Pulls hard (against it's plate - like any magnet, the material needs to be highly ferrous).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage! Impossible to line up and Absolutely no adjustment. They have zero give, not even a 1/16 of an inch. Holding strength is also worthless! Go with a Better brand or a buzzer latch.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Beaber

customer_reviews.title: Needs perfect alignment
customer_reviews.text: Holds well but is very fussy. This things needs aligned pretty much perfectly. I’m using it to hold a gate in place. I was using a different door magnet for years before it died, it would kind of draw the plate into it. This one I am going to try putting on springs so it has a little give
customer_reviews.author: S. Shrom

customer_reviews.title: It is relatively easy to mount and wire
customer_reviews.text: Instructions came only in a foreign language. I was able to get by searching for instructions and videos elsewhere. It is relatively easy to mount and wire.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hank

customer_reviews.title: The pictures are pretty easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you know what you are doing (read directions/instructions/tutorials online), because it doesn't come with instructions in English. The pictures are pretty easy to follow, though. Worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and never had an issue with this products ever.
customer_reviews.text: I bought many of those electromagnetics locks and never had a probable with them. Quality are pretty good and very easy to wire (I’m an licensed exprianced locksmith and you must know what you’re doing). *pics might be deffrance than the picture in this ads as I bought any of them from differents sellers. Either way never had an issue with any of the Mag Locks.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to disassemble without stripping screws. cables were somewhat torn from edges out of the box. Magnet works great.
customer_reviews.author: Will A.

customer_reviews.title: Yup.
customer_reviews.text: Walking into this, I had really no clue what I was doing. With an eye to get it lined up to the millimeter, I made my own (rather huge) clip brackets out of stuff from Axman. I got a run-of-the-mill 12v power adapter, and hooked it up to a Sonoff switch. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Buyer

customer_reviews.title: All you have to do is push hard and the ...
customer_reviews.text: All you have to do is push hard and the door opens. 1 of the locks you barely have to push with 4 amps going to each one.
customer_reviews.author: bryan mazur

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping,Great security works well
customer_reviews.text: Great magnet.Did everything I wanted it to do. If you need to secure a doorway with smooth, easy to use, technology, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FUGEST 600lbs Electromagnetic Lock Holding Force for Access Control Single Door 12V
product_meta.description:
This is a magnetic lock for your door with 280kgs (600lbs) holding force. It is suitable for wooden door, metal door, glass door, fireproof door, etc.

Specifications
Holding force:280kgs
Voltage:DC 12V
Current:380-430mA
Working temperature:-10 to 55 Celsius degree(14 to 131 Fahrenheit degree)
Humidity:0 to 95%
Working mode:power-on to lock
Lock size:25 * 4.7 * 2.5cm / 9.8 * 1.8 * 0.9in
Lock weight:1057g / 23.3lb
Plate size:18 * 3.9 * 1.1cm / 7 * 1.5 * 0.4in
Plate weight:580g / 1.2lb
Package size:27 * 6.3 * 6.3cm/10.6 * 2.4 * 2.4in
Package weight:1786g / 3.9lb


What is in the Box
1 * Electronic magnetic lock
1 * Armature plate
1 * Bag of installation kit
1 * Pad
feature_bullets: Use magnetic power to lock the door, 280kgs (600lbs) holding force.
Built-in reverse current protection device (MOV). Alluminum shell adopts high strength material, with hard anodised processing.
Corrosion resistant. Good quality and durable to use.
Fit for wooden door, metal door, glass door, fireproof door, etc.
Alluminum shell adopts high strength material, with hard anodised processing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
